## Hooks.on() method

Register a function to modify a filtered value

Signature:

```typescript
on<T extends keyof Hooks.Map & string>(id: T, callback?: (param?: Hooks.Map[T]) => Hooks.Map[T]): Framework;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                                       | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| id        | T                                                                                                          |             |
| callback  | (param?: [Hooks.Map](/api/bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]) =&gt; [Hooks/Map](//bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\] |             |

Returns:

[Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework)

## Example

```js
app.hooks.on("namespace.name.value", (value) => "replaced by this string");
```
